title: Close Congrats modal on Save to Memories and show 3-second pop-up notification

requirements.text: When the user clicks the "Save to Memories" button in the Congrats (MonthlyCompletionCelebrationModal) modal, immediately hide/close the modal and then show a pop-up notification for 3 seconds confirming the save.

quotes: In the congrats modal,  after clicking on the button:  'Save to Memories'  ,  Hide the Congrats modal and shows a pop-up notification for 3 seconds.

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking "Save to Memories" closes the Congrats modal immediately (no waiting for a notification to finish).
A pop-up notification appears after the click and auto-dismisses after ~3000ms.
The pop-up notification is visible even though the modal is closed (i.e., it is not rendered inside the modal content).
The memory is still saved successfully and the monthly memories UI refreshes as it does today.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/main.tsx or the Internet Identity hooks (immutable paths).
Keep backend unchanged (backend/main.mo remains unused for this feature).
nonGoals: Adding new backend persistence for memories (memories remain stored as they are today).
Changing the wording of the "Save to Memories" button.
